inclusion.criterion: NYHA Class II or III by symptoms
inclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass, and presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She has been experiencing mid-abdominal pain radiating to the left flank. CT abdomen without contrast showed a large heterogeneous left upper abdominal mass consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
